solution_line_template: It's a {total_fence_length}-foot fence, and Ben whitewashed {ben_whitewashed} feet, so there are {total_fence_length} - {ben_whitewashed} = <<{total_fence_length}-{ben_whitewashed}={fence_left_after_ben}>>{fence_left_after_ben} feet left after Ben is done.
Billy whitewashed a fifth of that, or {fence_left_after_ben} / {billy_fraction_denominator} = <<{fence_left_after_ben}/{billy_fraction_denominator}={billy_whitewashed}>>{billy_whitewashed} feet.
There is now {fence_left_after_ben} - {billy_whitewashed} = <<{fence_left_after_ben}-{billy_whitewashed}={fence_left_after_billy}>>{fence_left_after_billy} feet of fence left.

Johnny whitewashes a third of that, or {fence_left_after_billy} / {johnny_fraction_denominator} = <<{fence_left_after_billy}/{johnny_fraction_denominator}={johnny_whitewashed}>>{johnny_whitewashed} feet.
That leaves {fence_left_after_billy} - {johnny_whitewashed} = <<{fence_left_after_billy}-{johnny_whitewashed}={remaining_fence}>>{remaining_fence} feet of fence left to be whitewashed.
